txt.en: Do not allow either tower winch to be destroyed
A tower winch has been destroyed
Do not allow the tower winches to be destroyed

Goblins are swarming the central towers on the Deeping Wall. They plan to cause havoc by disabling the siege equipment prepared for use against their vast army. Aid the Rohirrim in securing the supplies, the winch, and the towers themselves, from the threat of the vandals.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Crate of siege supplies destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Winch mechanism damaged
Defend the towers from waves of goblins ([placeholder]/24)

The Rohirrim need aid in protecting the materials within the siege towers from the vandals ascending the wall. Protect the winch and supply crates from armed powder kegs and prevent allied guards from falling before the blows of the enemy.
A tower winch has been destroyed!
